title: shrI mInAmbikayA
sahitya:
shrI mInAmbikAyA param nahi rE rE citta nityam kAmEshvaryArAdhita paradEvyA


anupallavi

 sOma sundarEshvara mOhinyA malayadhvaja pANDya rAja praNata 
sharanyAyA nAma rUpa pArAyaNa priya rAja yOginyA


caraNam   nAda bindu kalAspada rUpiNyA navaratna vINA vAdinyA shrI 
dEvagAndhAri pUjitAmbujAsinyA kadambavana vilAsinyA guruguha jananyA
